full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Invitation to Tender: Deconstruction of Buildings 16 and 30, AAFC Nappan Research Farm

#### Solicitation # WS3839215722

#### Publication Date: February 8, 2023

#### Tender Closing Date: Tuesday, February 28, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Time

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a competitive tender for the deconstruction of Buildings 16 and 30 at the Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) Nappan Research Farm.

#### Background

This tender is a Phase 2 solicitation following an Invitation to Qualify. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid. The purpose of this Invitation to Tender (ITT) is to select a contractor to deconstruct Buildings 16 and 30 at the AAFC Nappan Research Farm.

#### Description of Services

The successful contractor will be required to dismantle and deconstruct Buildings 16 and 30, clearing the site of all debris and hazardous materials.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The contractor's bid will be evaluated on the basis of price. The lowest priced bid will be considered for award.

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to Trade Agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Tender Requirements

Eligible suppliers must register on the Government Electronic Tendering System (GC Breath).

#### Contact Information

For information regarding this tender, please contact:

* Timothee Beausoleil2
* PSPC
* (613) 946-3117
* timothee.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Submission Guidelines

Bids must be submitted electronically through the GC Breath system. Late bids will not be accepted.

Important details: deconstruction of Buildings 16 and 30 at the AAFC Nappan Research Farm, tender closing date: Tuesday, February 28, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Time.
